body:
Note : No device id check in command, because card work as master. For More clarification check code.
Master Card: Digital Input Voltage = GND
Protocol %{13-GETTBL0000}! => get total slave device number %{13-TBL0000+00005}! => set slave device count, default 5 %{13-GETTBL0001}! => time between two master command, default 5, 5 x 100mS = 500mS %{13-TBL0001+00010}! => set time between two master command %{13-GETTBL0002}! => Get link time out value %{13-TBL0002+00015}! => set link timeout value (XXXXX = 00015) Slave Card : Power Supply : 12V DC RS-485 2 Digital Input, 2 Digital Output Protocol %{??-INFO}! => To check device firmware version %{??-GETDID}! => Get Device ID %{??-DID01}! => always set device id, 00, 01, 02, 03, 04 %{??-GETTBL0002}! => Get link time out value %{??-TBL0002+00015}! => set link timeout value (XXXXX = value) Images
title: Alarm System

body: Features : Power Supply : 230V AC Seven Segment Display 3 Digital Output 2 Digital Input Switch for Control Product Images :
title: Bag Packing Controller

body:
Specification : Supply Voltage : 12VDC / 24VDC No of Stop: Upto G+7 Auto Door / Manual Door All Reed / Three Reed An error are display on LCD display. All system parameters can be adjusted by using 3 buttons and LCD placed on the card. Call Register LED and Call Push Button are on single wire. All the Input and Output are available in both 12VDC and 24VDC. All the Input and Output are carrying LED indication on board. Each floor can be named by an alphanumeric character (L, C, P, b, t, G, 0, 1, 2, 3…..). All pin can be re-configure to any other pin on site. UPS function. Hydraulic lift support. Documents : Open a Elevator Controller Wiring Detail
Product Images :

body: Features : Power Supply : 12V DC 6 Digital Input 4 Digital Output Two RS-485 communication support Current Measurement Protocol : %{??-INFO}! ==> read firware version %{??-GETVOLT}! ==> print debug value in terminal %{??-GETTBLxxxx}! ==> xxxx = address, get address value %{??-TBLxxxx+XXXXX}! ==> xxxx = address , XXXXX = value, set value to address Memory Detail : PARAMETER ADDRESS DEFAULT VALUE UNIT TOTAL_JAM_COUNT 23 10 FORWARD_RUN_TIME_LIMIT 24 10 Time in seconds REVERSE_RUN_TIME_LIMIT 25 1 Time in seconds FWD_JAM_TIME 26 240 Time in seconds MOTOR_JAM_CURRENT 27 45 For New Bharat 2HP 25 For Crompton 2HP - 6956 22 For Crompton 2HP - 6823 REVERSE_RUN_BOTTLE_COUNT 28 5 CALIBRATION_WT_1 29 1026 lower byte = x % 256 CALIBRATION_WT_2 30 higher byte = x / 256 DC_FWD_RUN_TIME 31 6 DC_REV_RUN_TIME 32 4 OVER_WEIGHT 33 85 TOTAL_DC_REV_RUN_COUNT 34 5 BOTTLE_CONT_SNS_TIME 35 180 LOAD_CELL_ERR_WT_1 36 5000 lower byte = x % 256 LOAD_CELL_ERR_WT_2 37 higher byte = x / 256 LOAD_CELL_ERR_WT_TIME 38 240 BOTTLE_COUNT_AUTO_TARE 39 30 SENSOR_SNS_TIME 40 40 minimum time required for accepting multiple sensor input. BIN_FULL_SNS_TIME 41 5 bin full flag valid if sensor continuous arrive for this much time. Wiring Detail : Note : check PCB version first

Windows In which ever directory you are, this line below will create a virtualenv there, you can name it anything.
> virtualenv venv Now if you are in same directory then type,
> venv\Scripts\activate to deactivate
deactivate Note : Enable execution policy to run activate scripts. (Administrator Privilege Required)
set-executionpolicy remotesigned

body:
About Embedded Art Embedded Hardware & Software Development CompanyFirst of all, Thanks and Welcome to all who have invested their precious time to know about us.
EMBEDDED ART established in 2016 by E&C Engineer, Brijesh Khokhar. Embedded Art is a medium size company providing microcontroller based solution for industrial and home applications.
We manufacture products & giving services related to Industrial Solution, Microcontroller Based Solution, Electrical Panel, LED Display Board, RS232/RS485 communication, Ethernet, Bluetooth, GSM Modem, RFID System, etc…
In July, 2018 we started to design our own Elevator Controller, to grow bussiness in elevator sector, as we develop our own elevator controller we can provide custom modification if custormer requred, we provide elevator controller and panel.
